metadata.name: Azure Compute Galleries
metadata.description: This module deploys an Azure Compute Gallery (formerly known as Shared Image Gallery).
Required. Name of the image definition.
Optional. The description of this gallery image definition resource. This property is updatable.
Required. This property allows you to specify the type of the OS that is included in the disk when creating a VM from a managed image.
Required. This property allows the user to specify the state of the OS of the image.
Required. This is the gallery image definition identifier.
Optional. Describes the resource range (1-128 CPU cores). Defaults to min=1, max=4.
Optional. Describes the resource range (1-4000 GB RAM). Defaults to min=4, max=16.

Optional. The hypervisor generation of the Virtual Machine. If this value is not specified, then it is determined by the securityType parameter. If the securityType parameter is specified, then the value of hyperVGeneration will be V2, else V1.
Optional. The security type of the image. Requires a hyperVGeneration V2. Defaults to `Standard`.
Optional. Specify if the image supports accelerated networking. Defaults to true.
Optional. Specify if the image supports hibernation.
Optional. The architecture of the image. Applicable to OS disks only.
Optional. The Eula agreement for the gallery image definition.
Optional. The privacy statement uri.
Optional. The release note uri. Has to be a valid URL.
Optional. Describes the gallery image definition purchase plan. This is used by marketplace images.
Optional. The end of life date of the gallery image definition. This property can be used for decommissioning purposes. This property is updatable.
Optional. Describes the disallowed disk types.

Optional. The privacy statement uri.
Optional. The release note uri. Has to be a valid URL.
Optional. The end of life date of the gallery application definition. This property can be used for decommissioning purposes. This property is updatable.
Optional. Array of role assignments to create.

Optional. Tags for all resources.
